| `options`  | `options` | See the Chart.js documentation for [Global Configuration](https://www.chartjs.org/docs/2.7.3/configuration/) and for your chosen [chart type](https://www.chartjs.org/docs/2.7.3/charts/). | `any`                    | `{}`        |
